title: 1.2.1崩溃求救
author: qibin
txt_content:
进入单人后就出这个了


Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7cf3a456 --------
Generated 15-8-1 下午9:31

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.1
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_04, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.9.0
OpenGL: Intel(R) G41 Express Chipset version 2.1.0 - Build 6.14.10.5355, Intel

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3
        at iw.a(SourceFile:246)
        at ic.a(SourceFile:259)
        at mt.a(SourceFile:182)
        at lo.b(SourceFile:790)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(SourceFile:757)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:664)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 634090a3 ----------
求大神找出原因

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
LZ请问你的版本是1.2.1？
你与世隔绝多久了？
换个java试试
